articles.content:
North side's delegation leaves for Seoul
     Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The north side's delegation left here today to participate in the August 15 meeting for national reunification to be held in Seoul.
 The delegation led by Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the national reconciliation council, consists of representatives from all walks of life and artistes.    
 They were seen off at the airport by Ryu Mi Yong, chairwoman of the central committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party, Kang Nung Su, minister of culture, leading officials of public organizations and officials concerned.

Director-level talks of foreign ministries of DPRK and Japan to be held
articles.content:
Director-level talks of foreign ministries of DPRK and Japan to be held
    Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Director-level talks of the foreign ministries of the DPRK and Japan are to be held in Pyongyang from August 25 to 26 under an agreement reached at the talks of the foreign ministers of the DPRK and Japan in Brunei Darussalam on July 31.
 The talks will discuss all the matters related to establishing diplomatic relations between the two countries and outstanding issues of bilateral concern.

articles.title: Greetings to Congolese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Congolese President
     Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Denis Sassou Nguesso, President of Congo, on the occasion of the 42nd anniversary of its independence.
 The message expressed belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the mutual interests of the two peoples and wished him success in his responsible work for national reconciliation and unity and the country's prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Vietnamese foreign minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Vietnamese foreign minister
    Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Foreign minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to Nguyen Dy Nien upon his reappointment as foreign minister of Vietnam. 
 In the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in the interests of socialism and the two peoples, the message sincerely wished him new success in his work.

articles.title: Paek Nam Sun receives credentials from UN resident coordinator
articles.content:
Paek Nam Sun receives credentials from UN resident coordinator 
    Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, foreign minister of the DPRK, today received credentials from Masood Hyder, newly appointed coordinator of the UN humanitarian affairs and resident representative of the UN Development Programme who is WFP representative and UN resident coordinator.

articles.title: Joint press release on 7th north-south ministerial talks
7th inter-Korean ministerial talks held
North side's delegation arrives in Seoul
North side's delegation to inter-Korean ministerial talks back
articles.content:
North side's delegation to inter-Korean ministerial talks back
    Pyongyang, August 14 (KCNA) -- The north side's delegation headed by chief councillor of the cabinet Kim Ryong Song returned here Wednesday after participating in the 7th north-south ministerial talks.
 It was greeted at the airport by minister of culture Kang Nung Su, director of the secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Fatherland An Kyong Ho and officials concerned.
